articles.title: How to determine whether a sore throat is Covid-19, and what it could be instead | Businessinsider - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: A sore throat can be but is not always a symptom of Covid-19. The best way to know if a sore throat is a Covid symptom is to take a test.
articles.content:
Up to 80% of sore throat cases happen due to viral infections, such as influenza, rhinovirus, and coronavirus.  
Covid-19, another viral infection, can also cause a sore throat — but it may feel a l… [+7806 chars]
